name: the color of the sound # 190721
description: voltage controls the separation of colors between adjacent blocks. Higher voltage = more separation. voltage controls the alignment of block colors which is their rate of change. Higher voltage = more alignment and thus their color velocities will become the same. voltage controls the cohesion of block colors which is converging on a single color. Higher voltage = more cohesion and thus their colors will quickly become the same and Photron will look like one color
